EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I noticed in your order notes that you would prefer your equipment to arrive before ____. We may be able to upgrade your shipping to an AM delivery, Depending on your zip code items generally arrive by 10:30am, but it can rarely be as late as noon. The cost for this service is an additional $20 per box. Otherwise, the shipment may arrive at any time during business hours, occasionally up-to, or later than 7pm. To do this we MUST hear back from you by 1:00 PM PST (4:00 EST) Please let me know if you would like to upgrade your shipping method. If we don't hear back from you we will ship for standard delivery.
Thank you,
{!Case.OwnerFirstName} BorrowLenses.com Verifications Team verify@borrowlenses.com (844) 853-6737 x4
